data.sentence: The word وَلَقَدْ comes from the root ق د and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: (Nun-Thal-Ra) to dedicate, make a vow, warn, admonish, caution, promise voluntarily, offer present. nadhiir - warner, one who informs and averts calamity, who cautions and put one on guard.
data.sentence: The word بِالنُّذُرِ comes from the root ن ذ ر and is associated with the meanings: (Nun-Thal-Ra) to dedicate, make a vow, warn, admonish, caution, promise voluntarily, offer present. nadhiir - warner, one who informs and averts calamity, who cautions and put one on guard.

data.meanings: To draw forth a thing, to dispute or contend, to doubt.
data.sentence: The word فَتَمَارَوْا comes from the root م ر ي and is associated with the meanings: To draw forth a thing, to dispute or contend, to doubt.
